description: Extend the function of ASF (ArchiSteamFarm), add several practical commands

installer.script: if (installed 'archisteamfarm' $global) {Copy-Item "$dir\ASFEnhance.dll" "$(appdir archisteamfarm $global)\current\plugins"} else { error 'Please install `archisteamfarm` first, then reinstall `asfenhance`.'}
